page.title: 08INVERKEILOR
page.content:
The village takes its name from the word "Inver" meaning "at the mouth of " and Keilor, a small stream which enters the sea about 2 km away.The village has 5 streets with a mixture of private and council housing.There are houses for senior citizens and recently more houses have been built especially for the elderly and handicapped. The village serves as a centre for nearly all of the daily activities of the area.
{CLUBS}_ Most of the people who live in this area go to organizations in Inverkeilor.There are a lot of clubs for adults and children in the village .When we asked people in the area if they would like more facilities their answers varied,but many people would like a bowling green.
